PARAGRAPH.STRING: (Hebrew: מֹשֶׁה, Standard Mošə Tiberian Mōšeh; Arabic: موسى, Mūsa; Ge'ez: ሙሴ Musse) is a Biblical Hebrew liberator, leader, lawgiver, prophet, and historian.
is considered one of the greatest figures of the Bible.
is considered a prophet in Judaism, Christianity, Islam and the Bahá'í Faith.
